attributes.action: Stop Ebay selling teeth whitening kits
attributes.additional_details:
Dentists are the professionals qualified to prescribe and treat patients for teeth whitening.
There are European laws in place to ensure that the peroxide doesn't exceed 16%.

Ebay are allowing sellers to promote teeth whitening kits that way above the legal limits with some as much as 45% peroxide. It even states on some of the listings to consult a dentist if you plan on using the product to treat a child.

This is extremely dangerous and must be stopped.

By signing this petition, we are asking the Government to ensure that Ebay stop users selling teeth whitening kits.
